column2: George Romero's Empire of the Dead: Act Three (2015) #3
column6: THE FINAL CHAPTER IN GEORGE ROMERO'S EPIC EMPIRE OF THE DEAD SAGA CONTINUES! ELECTION DAY! Will Chandrake retain his rule, or will Chilly Dobbs have his day? Will the election even matter, as the rebellion's shock and awe tactics threaten the city?! Detective Perez makes a terrifying discovery!
column8: | penciller (cover):Francesco Mattina | artist:Andrea Mutti | writer:George Romero
